channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 14:28 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 14:28 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 14:28 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Creat by further messages.
